body: Honestly like why my guy....FUCKING READ THE GODDAMN FINE PRINT!!! Like for fuck sakes ntr protagonists sure got it coming.
Just like in real life, people have no sympathy for men. It's dumb to expect anything different in fiction.
What a brainlet, signing things without looking at the fine print. He deserved it.
He brought that upon himself for being a dumbass so no simpathy from me

True happiness comes at a price. Sometimes, you lose more than you have when you take a loan. In the end, love be it in need of or have plenty of, should be all that matters than wanting someone to be happy. I really loved this comic. I hope there is a 2nd part to this.

Now you realized that you could've just done away with the church and just live with her? Too little, too late. And you believed and hoped that happiness is just around the corner? Even when you were on "borrowed time" of said hope and happiness? If one was able to provide you with happiness, then they could also easily take it away, too. True happiness is something you work, earn, and realize for yourself, not just thrown your way b/c that's called entitlement/privilege. You deserved what happened to you. Especially when you were going to "borrow" again to pay back that loan... Btw 20% = Jabba the Hut
Extra story: after that Morozov will eat those eggs lol
